name: Knockoff
description:
A knockoff of Boulder Dash, a 1984 video game. Why such name? It's inspired by Riptoff, a Boulder Dash ripoff.

Uses TIC-80 (a Pico-8 ripoff) and programmed in fennel (a clojure ripoff, for Lua, which is fake Javascript).

Plot:

In the Avant-Garde Burrows And Dragons universe, one little froggie gets cursed by an evil mage to transmute into Mole-Frog. Advantages? He can dig tunnels in ground now. Disadvantage? His metabolism had changed and he no longer can eat plain flies and mosquitos and stay fresh and energized. He's powered by nuclear fusion now and require special magical gems found underground. He had to leave his home wetland and descend into subterranean planes of existence. 

Unfinished, primary todos:

  • death
  • proper falling of boulders
  • boulder pushing
